text: Zaraz shcho pravda prybula yim z nas, vony skazaly, "Yakby tilʹky my mohly podani shcho davatysya Moses!" Vony ne disbelieve u shcho davalysʹ Moses ranishe? Vony skazaly, "Obydva (svyati pysannya) pratsi zacharuvannya shcho kopiyuvaly odyn odnym." Vony takozh skazaly, "My disbelievers u obydva z nykh
